name: Get_Location
response_summary: The API response lists three country codes: MY for Malaysia, IN for India, and AU for Australia. These codes represent the countries included in the data.
enhance_func_desc: This API is suitable for retrieving basic country information. It provides a list of country codes, such as MY for Malaysia, IN for India, and AU for Australia, which can be used for location-based services or data categorization. The response includes standardized country codes, enabling easy integration with other systems or APIs that require country identification. No input parameters are needed.

countries.description: List of country codes included in the data

ar_items.description: ISO 2-letter country code (e.g., MY for Malaysia, IN for India, AU for Australia)
